resources.string: Focus your attention on active discussions by closing threads when they\'re no longer relevant or have concluded.
Respond to teammates with any emoji. (Plus a new composer on web!)
Reference relevant discussions effortlessly. Tap the lightning bolt or type / to find and share a channel or thread from your composer.
Turn off notifications and unreads for this thread
The name of your project. It\'ll create a new channel in Twist.
Couldn\'t create your channel. Please try again.
What\'s a project your team is working on?
It may have been deleted, or the link could be wrong.
Hmmm, that channel couldn\'t be found
To access it, you\'ll need to be invited by a member.
#{channel_name} has been archived. To join and add new comments, ask a team admin or the channel owner to unarchive it.
This change will be noted in the thread along with the conclusion. Anyone can reopen a thread anytime.
What was the outcome of this thread?
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Couldn\'t verify your email. Please re-send it and try again.
​​Can\'t see the email? This article will help you find it.
You\'re already logged in with another account. Please confirm the email from the device you started signing up, or log out to retry here.
You can safely go back to your Twist team to collaborate.
To start using Twist, confirm your email address with the email we sent to {email_address}
To start using Twist, confirm your email address with the email we sent you.
Sorry! Please try to log in again, or contact us if it still doesn\'t work.
Resend a confirmation email, then check your email app.
Check your email on this device
With Dropbox installed, you can access all your stuff in your favorite apps, like this one!
With the new Dropbox app, you can access all your stuff in your favorite apps, like this one!
Yes, I\'m sure I want to delete this channel
Yes, I want to leave this team
Yes, I want to remove this user
Your changes will be noted in the conversation
Your changes will be noted in the thread
Members can still visit and search the channel, but they won’t be able to add people, start threads, or add comments.\10\10Admins can unarchive channels any time.
Are you sure you want to delete the {channel_name} channel?\10\10All threads and comments will be removed from Twist forever, and you cannot restore the content once deleted.
Are you sure you want to leave this channel? You can always join it later.
Are you sure you want to leave this private channel? Only invited users can get access to it.
All members will be able to start threads and post comments again.
Are you sure you want to leave this conversation?
This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save a draft?
This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
Are you sure you want to leave the {team_name} team?\10\10An administrator or full member needs to re-invite you if you would like to rejoin this team.
Everyone in the channel will still be able to see your comment, but no one will be notified about it. Are you sure?
Everyone in the channel will still be able to see your thread, but no one will be notified about it. Are you sure?
You haven\'t finished setting up your account, all changes will be lost. Are you sure?
Are you sure you want to remove {user_name} from {model_name}?
Are you sure you want to remove {user_name} from {team_name}?\10\10Users need to be re-invited by an administrator or full member if they would like to rejoin this team.
We\'re sorry to hear that. Please let us know how we could improve.
We\'re glad to hear it! Would you mind taking a moment to rate the app? We\'d be grateful for your help.
Everyone in the channel will still be able to see your comment, but no one will be tagged. Are you sure?
Everyone in the channel will still be able to see your thread, but no one will be tagged. Are you sure?
Mark all threads in \"{channel_name}\" as read?
Mark all direct messages as read?
Mark all threads in Inbox as read?
Mark all threads in Starred as read?
Send or forward an email to this address to create a new thread:
Send or forward an email to this address to create a new message:
Send or forward an email to this address to create a new comment:
{email_address} is associated with a team. Any references to this address will be replaced by your primary account email address.
Are you sure you want to delete this email address?
This email address is already associated with this account. Please type a different address.
You can add and remove email addresses for use in your team profiles and receiving notifications.
This email address will be used for account related notifications.
Email addresses can be managed from the {screen_name} screen.
Email addresses can be managed from the {screen_name} section.
Would this message fit better as a thread where everyone can find it and others can easily be looped in later?
Group people by team or project, then notify them in threads to save time.
Find updates to all the threads you participate in across all channels.
Channels organize your team\'s threaded conversations by department or project.
Make Twist your central place to discuss work and find information.
Start a direct or group message

- Messages are a great way to quickly touch base or just be social.\10\10- Threads are the best option to share your thoughts fully in organized, on-topic conversations.\10\10When in doubt, start a thread.
Twist turns your team conversations into searchable knowledge you can tap into any time.
Search by name to add a participant
Add a star to threads, then come back here to easily reference them later.
You don\'t belong to any team :(
Channels organize your team\'s threaded conversations by department or project.
Threads are the best way to discuss a new idea, share updates on your progress, or get feedback from your team.
Couldn\'t create a temporary file to store your photo.
Couldn\'t sign in with Apple. Please try again.
Couldn\'t authenticate. Please check your data and try again.
Couldn\'t sign in with Google. Please try again.
Couldn\'t log in. Please check your email and password and try again.
Couldn\'t accept invite. Please try again.
Couldn\'t load invite. Please try again.
Couldn\'t load content. Please check your internet connection.
Failed to read the media file
Couldn\'t reset password. Please try again.
Couldn\'t set password. Please try again.
To reset your password, enter the email address of your Twist account:
Select the channels you’d like new members to join
Manages the entire team. Can invite and remove members and update all team settings.
Guests must be invited to at least one channel. Those with access to more than one channel will be billed the same as full team members.
A limited member of your team. Can only access channels that they\'ve been invited to by a member or team admin.
Has full access to your Twist team. Can invite members and browse, join, and create public channels.
A channel is a shared place for conversations, files, and teammates. It\'s where work happens in Twist.​
The old invite link will no longer work, and a new link will be created for you to share instead.
New members will be able to join using the link below. Copy and share!
Some changes you\'ve made won\'t be saved. Log out anyway?
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
You need connection for this action!
Who is working on this project with you?
You can always create or join more channels later
By continuing with Google, Apple or Email, you agree to Twist\'s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
Passwords must be at least {counter} characters long.
Profile photo temporarily set by {screen_name}\10Changes back on {date}
Couldn\'t open your device\'s photo picker
Please wait until we\'re done processing your photo
Notifications will be sent to {email_address}. This can be changed in your {screen_name}.
Twist will bundle notifications in an hourly email digest.
When I\'m not active, notify me
You\'ll be notified when a teammate posts a new thread, comment, or direct message including you.
You\'ll be notified when a teammate @mentions you in a thread, comment, or any direct message.
You\'ll be notified when a teammate @mentions you in a thread or comment or sends you a 1-on-1 direct message.
You\'ll be notified when a teammate mentions you in a thread or sends you a direct message.
You\'ll be notified when a teammate sends you a new direct message.
You won\'t receive any mobile notifications from Twist.
You\'ll be notified when a teammate sends you a 1-on-1 direct message.
You\'ll be notified when a teammate sends you a direct message.
You\'ll be notified when a teammate posts a new thread or comment including you.
Your profile information will be viewable by anyone on your team.
Currently, your team has access to one month of history. There are older comments on this thread.
Currently, your team has access to one month of history. There are older messages in this conversation.
Currently, your team has access to one month of history. Some comments and messages may not be shown because they are older than one month.
Almost there. Just enter a new password for your Twist account:
We sent you an email with a link to reset your password.
Please set your account\'s rollout key in the AndroidManifest.xml
Continue to sign up or log in to the workspace.
Up to 2 threads can be pinned
Access to external storage is required
Twist won\'t send any notifications on the days you\'ve selected. Disconnect and enjoy your days off!
During scheduled snoozing times, Twist won\'t send you any notifications. You can turn this option off at any time.
Start and end time cannot be equal!
Snoozing will turn off all notifications for a short time.
Mark all conversations as read failed
Mark all threads in inbox as read failed
Mark all threads in channel as read failed
Moving thread to another channel failed
This General thread is a good place to kickstart the channel, share updates, or ask questions that don\'t require new threads.
{user_name} installed the [{integration_name}]({integration_url}) integration on this thread.
The [{integration_name}]({integration_url}) integration has automatically been paused. Reopen this thread to activate it again.
{user_name} uninstalled the {integration_name} integration from this thread.
{user_name} changed this thread’s subject from \"{old_title}\" to \"{new_title}\".
{user_name} changed this conversation’s title from \"{old_title}\" to \"{new_title}\".
Looks like that person is no longer a member of this team.
The name of your company or team. Keep it simple.
Let\'s set up a home for your work​
Couldn\'t update team name. Please try again.
When Time Off is in effect, Twist won\'t send desktop, mobile or email notifications. Your team will see that you\'re away and when you\'re coming back.
Have a restful day away from work!
You\'re not truly taking a break unless your notifications do. Disconnect and fully recharge.
Rest and get well in your day off.
Enjoy your day away from work!
Start date cannot be in the past
Return date should be after start date
Return date should be set in the future
Your Time off has been set.
Let your teammates know the reason you\'ll be away.
What do you want to discuss?
Make sure your profile is up to date so teammates can easily recognize and get to know you.
Fill in your name so teammates can recognize you.
User doesn\'t belong to the channel (may not receive notification)
Manages the whole team. Can invite and remove members, update, and edit this team\'s settings.
A limited member of your team. Can only access channels they\'ve been invited to.
A full member of your team. Can invite members, browse, and join all public channels.
Guests must be a member of at least one channel to be a part of this team.
We can\'t leave your team without an admin. If you still want to downgrade your role, promote someone else to admin first.
Sorry! You\'re the last admin left standing

{user_name} will be downgraded from admin to guest.\10\10Guests can only access channels they\'ve been invited to by a full member or admin of the team. They can\'t invite members or join other public channels.\10\10Are you sure?

You will be downgraded from admin to guest.\10\10Guests can only access channels they\'ve been invited to by a full member or admin of the team. They can\'t invite members or join other public channels.\10\10Are you sure?
{user_name} will be downgraded from admin to member.\10\10Members can invite new people and join public channels, but they can\'t remove people or edit team settings.\10\10Are you sure?
You will be downgraded from admin to member.\10\10Members can invite new people and join public channels, but you will no longer be able to remove members or edit team settings.\10\10Are you sure?

{user_name} will be downgraded from member to guest.\10\10Guests can only access channels they\'ve been invited to by a full member or admin of the team. They can\'t invite members or join other public channels.\10\10Are you sure?
{user_name} will be promoted to a admin of this team.\10\10Admins can remove members and edit team settings.\10\10Are you sure?
{user_name} will be promoted to a member of this team.\10\10Members can invite new people and join public channels, but they can\'t remove people or edit team settings.\10\10Are you sure?
